string.Data:
Attitude and Distance Indicator

This app displays the orientation of your Android device in space and is able to measure the distance to a location around you.

Attitude Indicator
The artificial horizon represented on the screen by the white horizontal lines indicates the current orientation of your Android device in space. The number above the artificial horizon represents the compass. It indicates the azimuth value i.e. the horizontal angle to North. 0° represents North, while 180° represents South.

Distance measurement
For distance measurement aim with the red line at the location to which you want to measure the distance. To get an accurate distance measurement, the point at which you are aiming should be on the same elevation level as the ground on which you are standing. The distance value is displayed at the bottom of the screen.

Advice: In order to make the distance measurement more accurate you should set the height at which you are holding your Android device in the settings menu on the upper right of the screen.
